[[1992â93 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|1992â93]] |} [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] (MÄ°Y) participated in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] [[1991â92 Turkish Second Football League|1991â92]] season for the 18th time and finished tenth. The team also participated in [[Turkish Cup]] (''TÃ¼rkiye KupasÄ±'') in [[1991â92 Turkish Cup|1991â92]] and eliminated at Round 3. ==1991â92 league participation== [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] took place in Group C in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] [[1991â92 Turkish Second Football League|1991â92]] season. League played in three groups two with 17 teams and one with 18 teams. Bottom three teams relegated to [[Turkish Third Football League|Third League]], whereas top team promoted to [[Turkish First Football League|First League]] at the end of the season[http://www.angelfire.com/nj/sivritepe/9192/CP2L.html Cem Pekin Archives] 25 August 2009.. MÄ°Y didn't show previous year's performance and finished 10th with 12 wins and 44 goals. ===League table=== Mersin Ä°Y's league performance in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] Group C in [[1991â92 Turkish Second Football League|1991â92]] season is shown in the following tableStandings and results from [http://www.tff.org/default.aspx?pageID=811 TFF second league page]. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !rowspan=2|place !rowspan=2|team !colspan=4|games !colspan=2|goals !rowspan=2|points !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|home !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|away |- !
